Items.Title: Application no. 20055605 SCX, a proposed site for a public school facility located generally at Jerome Avenue between West 172nd Street and Goble Place, Council District no. 16, Borough of the Bronx.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
